name: Bomb Golfing Volume 1
description:
Bomb Golfing is a puzzle-ish platformer where your central tool for movement is also your main mean of destruction.

Rocket jump and blow up blocks through 18 levels in the first volume of Bomb Golfing, with more levels coming sometime in the future.

Change the color palette to suit your preferences, and try to beat all of the levels with both the minimum blocks blown up, and the minimum total bombs used.
